item.title: Nadra add a quote by Tom Wolfe
item.description: "One belongs to New York instantly, one belongs to it as much in five minutes as in five years." -- Tom Wolfe

item.title: Nadra add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Nadra add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description:
"When you work you fulfill a part of earth's furthest dream, assigned to you when that dream was born, And what is it to work with love? It is to weave the cloth with threads drawn from your heart, even as if your beloved were to wear that cloth.
It is to build a house with affection, even as if your beloved were to dwell in that house.
It is to sow seeds with tenderness and reap the harvest with joy, even as if your beloved were to eat the fruit.
It is to charge all things you fashion with a breath of your own spirit.
Work is love made visible" -- Kahlil Gibran
